headline: Mark Cuban Hates Trump but Loves Kid Savings Accounts — Will He Shock Everyone?
summary: Billionaire Mark Cuban has long championed the idea that kids should start saving early to secure their futures. Drawing from his own childhood in Pittsburgh, where he sold garbage bags door-to-door to fund small dreams like new basketball shoes, Cuban stresses hands-on financial lessons. In interviews, he advises parents to open savings accounts for children ... Mark Cuban Hates Trump but Loves Kid Savings Accounts — Will He Shock Everyone?
